name: 罗伯托·塔拉索纳
awards: 2025年 第75届柏林国际电影节 新生代儿童单元 国际评审团最佳短片 (提名) 关键一步
name_full: 罗伯托·塔拉索纳 Roberto Tarazona

last_movies.title: Now He Is in the Truth and We Are Still in the Lie

introduction: He took a degree at the European Film College in Denmark where he graduated in cinematography and specialised in directing. In 2023, he graduated with a master’s in alternative cinema from the Escuela Internacional de Cine y TV in Cuba and returned to the school in 2024 to join the documentary film department.
